|lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = Yes |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = Compex bootloader;;; |stockos = CompexWRT;;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 12-pin header |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header |specialfeat = |flags = MU-MIMO |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = 520 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== See also Manufacturer's customized version of the board - [[Compex WPJ428]]. ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @710 MHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU *QCA Reference firmware supported *2.4GHz 2x2 400Mbps 802.11n, 5GHz 2x2 867Mbps 802.11ac Wave 2 *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g/n *2x 1Gbps Ethernet Ports LAN RJ45 with Auto MDI-X *DC input 12~24V (LV version); 24~48V (HV version) {| class="wikitable" |+SPECIFICATION TABLE |- |Product Type |Wireless Embedded Board, QCA Reference Design DK03 |- |Chipset |IPQ4028 |- |CPU Frequency |710 MHz |- |Architecture |ARM Cortex-A7 |- |System Memory |128MB |- |Flash Memory |16MB |- |Wireless Standard |802.11ac, 802.11n, 802.11g, 802.11b, 802.11a |- |MIMO Channels |2x2 |- |Frequency Range |2.4GHz & 5GHz |- |Output Power (Per Chain) |19dBm @2.4GHz, 18dBm @5GHz |- |Wireless Speed |400Mbps @2.4GHz, 867Mbps @5GHz |- |Interface |1x JTAG 20 Pin Connector, 1x Serial Port 4 Pin Connector,
5x GbE Port, 1x RJ45 Console Port, 4x U.FL Connectors |- |LED |7x LED Indicators |- |DC Jack |12~24V (LV version), 24~48V (HV version) |- |Reset Button |Yes, 1x F/W Reset Button |- |Operating System |QCA Reference Firmware |- |Certification |CE, FCC, REACH and RoHS Compliance |- |Power Consumption |19 Watts |- |Temperature Range |Operating: -20°C to 70°C, Storage: -40°C to 90°C |- |Humidity |Operating:5% to 95% (non-condensing) |- |Dimension |117 × 105 × 32mm (PCBA with heatsink)(W x H x D) |} ==See also== :[https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Embedded Boards] *[[Compex WSB419]] (DK04) *[[Compex WPJ428]] (DK01) *Compex AP-DK03 (DK03) *[[Compex WPQ864]] *[[Compex WPQ865]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
